tool_description: This API provides users from live crypto news articles from various news resources around the world.
name: Crypto Live News API
title: Crypto Live News API

api_list.name: Get Individual News Source Live Crypto News
api_list.description: This endpoint will return all live crypto news articles from one specific news source.
api_list.code:
import requests

url = "https://crypto-live-news-api.p.rapidapi.com/news/cointelegraph"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "crypto-live-news-api.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.get(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())
api_list.convert_code:
import requests

url = "https://crypto-live-news-api.p.rapidapi.com/news/{newspaperid}"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "crypto-live-news-api.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.get(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())

api_list.name: Get All Live Crypto News Articles
api_list.description: This endpoint will return all live crypto news articles from resources all over the world.
